CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(refedge__Disposition__c,''),ISPICKVAL(refedge__Disposition__c,'Contacted')),HYPERLINK('/apex/'+ $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c +'AssignAction?Id='+ Id + '&retURl='+ refedge__Account__c, 'Assign', '_self'),'Assign')+'|'+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(refedge__Disposition__c,''),ISPICKVAL(refedge__Disposition__c,'Contacted')),HYPERLINK('/apex/'+ $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c +'ReminderAction?Id='+ Id + '&retURl='+ refedge__Account__c, 'Reminder', '_self'),'Reminder') +'|'+ IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(refedge__Disposition__c,''),ISPICKVAL(refedge__Disposition__c,'Contacted')) , HYPERLINK('/apex/'+ $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c +'HitListReleaseAction?Id='+ Id +'&retURl='+ refedge__Account__c, 'Release', '_self'), 'Release')
CustomField.label: Action
